column1: The  Cyclonic Storm “FENGAL” [pronounced as  FEINJAL]  over Southwest Bay of  Bengal was
located about 280km North of Kankasanthurai and 420 km north of Trincomalee at 02.30 p.m.
on 30th November 2024. It is likely to move west-northwestwards and cross north Tamil Nadu-
Puducherry coasts as a cyclonic storm around 30th November, evening. Influence of this system
on the island's weather is gradually reducing.
